means: <希神> 拉奥孔，拉奥孔雕像
[人名] 拉奥孔（希腊传说中的先知和祭司）

sentence.Network_en: However, when it comes to plastic arts, Laocoon finds its very conservative side.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是, 若就造型艺术来说, 《拉奥孔》的观点却是十分保守的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: laocious 老子, laocoon 莱辛, laocius 老子

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) the priest of Apollo who warned the Trojans to beware of Greeks bearing gifts when they wanted to accept the Trojan Horse; a god who favored the Greeks (Poseidon or Athena) sent snakes who coiled around Laocoon and his two twin sons ki
